title: National debt of Germany in relation to gross domestic product 2010 to 2024
yAxis: National debt as percent of GDP
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes National debt as percent of GDP. In total the number of data points it has is 15.
In general National debt as percent of GDP has fallen over the Year.
National debt as percent of GDP is roughly constant from 2010 to 2012, and finally slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2024.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum National debt as percent of GDP, about 80.96 was reported at Year 2010
Minimum National debt as percent of GDP about 43.7 was reached at Year 2024
